item.description:
An Introduction to the Art of Living Course

Description:
Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, Founder of the Art of Living Foundation, is coming to Hartford on July 22 along with 2000 other meditators from around the world. Find out how at the Introduction to the Art of Living Course. Monday's Meetup will introduce us to the powerful exercises of the Art of Living course, including: gentle yoga, effective breathing techniques and a guided meditation. Each of us has the built in ability to calm our mind and harness more energy in minutes, only we don't know how to utilize this secret weapon called our breath.

Everyone who is breathing is welcome ;-) We will meet in the library board room.



West Hartford Public Library
20 South Main Street
Main Library Board Room
West Hartford, CT 06107

For information, please contact:
Natalie Kaharick
Art of Living Foundation, USA
202-258-1517 | natalie@artofliving.org

The Art of Living Course in the Presence of Sri Sri Ravi Shankar
July 22-25, 2010 | Connecticut Convention Center
http://us.artofliving...
item.name: An Introduction to the Art of Living Course
